attributes.action: Fairness, Impartiality and Non-Respect of Persons Act
attributes.additional_details:
I.   Fairness is a fundamental principle underlying our Country's, Parliament's, Government's and Legal System's national morality.

II.   Impartiality should therefore also be a fundamental principle.

III.   Notwithstanding the Principle of "Honour to whom Honour", there should be no "Respect of Persons" (i.e., no Favouritism or Prejudice towards any.)
